message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it could be a game-changer for you. Considering its worth to us and the potential it holds for you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This offer is tailored to provide you with a substantial advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.
